name: Bipolar
description:
This series is about the inconsistencies of the bipolar manic phase.

When I am under the influence of this terrifying atmosphere, delusions of grandeur, happiness, depression, lethargy and sexual impulsiveness are part of my intimacy.

In this series, there will be pieces that are extremely colorful and dark, because things tend to be beautiful, vivid, euphoric, but they also tend to be sad, heavy, depressing and suicidal.

This is the deepest part of me.

-

Abstract light painting created with steel wool on fire in pitch darkness. It was complemented by digital art.

'Bipolar' - 6000 x 7284, PNG | 65,4 MB on disk

*

Catastrophic Brain, 2022

*

Original artwork by @carolinabragaferreira/@artcarolinabf

(1 - hicetnunc.art/artcarolinabf)

Brazil, 2022
